title: time: TestReset is unreliable
body:
The TestReset test added in
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ee7deff1bbd7eb34c1338da06229e4894b7f9b1a is
unreliable on pretty much anything that isn't linux/amd64.

--- FAIL: TestReset (0.15 seconds)
sleep_test.go:254:      resetting unfired timer returned false
FAIL
FAIL    time    4.136s

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

http://build.golang.org/log/a6bee60a182e376da83ade955655dc08d20ded37
